title: Classification of Semiconductor Wafer Defects using Deep Transfer Learning-based Approaches
description: Developed deep transfer learning models for automated semiconductor wafer defect classification, improving quality control in manufacturing. Applied ResNet, VGG, and custom CNN architectures to achieve high-accuracy defect detection.

title: Classification of Emotional States from Electrocardiogram Signals using XGBoost
description: Implemented XGBoost-based classification of emotional states using ECG signal features. Achieved robust classification performance through feature engineering and hyperparameter optimization of gradient boosting models.
